column5: The Nook may be famous for its cheese-stuffed “Juicy Lucy” burger, but have you seen the basement? An old train car sits in this basement bowling alley, adorned with over $16,000 worth of one dollar bills. Patrons decorate the bills and tack them up on the ceiling and walls with toothpicks. Sharpies are provided.
column6: The basement bowling alley of this St. Paul dive bar is decorated with thousands of dollar bills.
column8: 492 Hamline Ave S; Saint Paul, Minnesota; United States
